ygData.subject: Re: Re[4]: What I tried
ygData.msgSnippet: Well folks, I tried the formula below as well as variations ( No grease, and adding wire) and none of them are correct.  Those gears are expensive hehe. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Well folks,

I tried the formula below as well as variations ( No grease, and adding
wire) and none of them are correct. Those gears are expensive hehe.


----- Original Message -----
From: beggs, james a <stormshadow@...>
To: Mistywinds <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 13, 1999 12:08 PM
Subject: Re[4]: [EQ_Tinkering] What I tried


> From: stormshadow@... (beggs, james a)
>
> Hello Mistywinds,
>
> Friday, August 13, 1999, 10:47:11 AM, you wrote:
>
> M> From: "Mistywinds" <hjwalla@...>
>
> M> I remember in beta someone told me it was like:
> M> 2 rods
> M> 1 shaft
> M> 1gear
> M> and I think some kinda lube... been a while buy maybe it will help you
get
> M> on track.
>
> Ok, uhm for the second time, what recipes are you guys talking about?
> I got on the list in the middle of this conversation, smile.
>
> Best regards,
> James mailto:StormShadow@...
>
